meanings.sent1: She tried her darndest to finish the race first.
meanings.sent2: It was the darndest storm they had ever seen.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel made the darndest attempt to reach the bird feeder.
meanings.sent4: His darndest effort paid off when he won the competition.
meanings.sent5: The darndest noise came from the old, creaky house.

meanings.sent1: The darndest thing happened on their trip to the zoo.
meanings.sent2: It was the darndest coincidence that they met at the party.
meanings.sent3: The cat made the darndest face when it saw the cucumber.
meanings.sent4: Her darndest outfit caught everyone's attention at the event.
meanings.sent5: The darndest news spread quickly through the small town.
